149.2: R’ Shmuel bar Nachmani said in the name of R’ Yochanan:  three are called by the name of the Holy One, and they are: the righteous, the Messiah and Jerusalem.
149.3: The righteous, as we said above.  The Messiah, as it is written  “…this is his name that he shall be called, The Lord is our righteousness.” (Jeremiah 23:6) Jerusalem, as it is written  “All around it amounts to 18,000; and the name of the city from that day will be "The Lord is There."” (Ezekiel 48:35)
